name: Anaconda Python IDE
short_description:
This project is under planning phase..

Anaconda Python Studio is an Visual Rad IDE for the Anaconda Python Language for users who will built Light Vision for Windows and Linux and later also MacOSX, IOS on IPhone, Android and Windows Mobile as well. Users can build and run different types of applications by using the visual gui designer inside Anaconda Python Studio for drawing and placing widgets and components on forms and then write code in the Python Language. Anaconda Python is going to be built for the new Light Vision which is still under construction and planning phase.

more info coming soon..
summary: An Visual IDE for developing in Python
